Nice wall decorations and fence posts. Picture is about to be attached as required. Thank you for the cache! Danke schÃ¶n!--------I had a bit over half a day in Munich before the flight and I spent this beautiful warm and sunny day mostly in the pleasant calm neighbourhoods west of the central bus station and around Nymphenburg park.Â  There are lots of nice caches, but it shows that Bavaria is in the middle of German speaking areas, so too many cache owners do not bother to translate their entries. Automatic translation works quite fine but it is time-consuming.
